text: Advances in Microbial Physiology is an biannual peer-reviewed scientific journal covering microbiology. It was established in 1967 and is published by Academic Press. The founding editors-in-chief were Anthony H. Rose and John Frome Wilkinson; the current editor is Robert K. Poole (University of Sheffield). Each issue is also published as a book with a separate ISBN. == Abstracting and indexing == The journal is abstracted and indexed by Index Medicus/MEDLINE/PubMed, Chemical Abstracts Service, Science Citation Index, BIOSIS Previews, and Scopus. According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2013 impact factor of 5.800. == References == == External links == * Category:Microbiology journals Category:Publications established in 1967 Category:Academic Press academic journals Category:Physiology journals Category:English-language journals Category:Biannual journals
title: Advances in Microbial Physiology
